title: The Problem We Noticed
story: Many talented students miss scholarship opportunities simply because information is scattered, outdated, or hard to trust.

title: Students Feel Overwhelmed
story: Searching across multiple websites, social media posts, and PDFs creates confusion and discourages students from applying.

title: Lack of Trustworthy Sources
story: Students often face scams or unofficial announcements, making it difficult to identify real and verified scholarships.

title: The Idea Behind ScholarStream
story: ScholarStream was created to centralize verified scholarship opportunities in one simple, accessible platform.

title: Organized and Student-Friendly
story: Scholarships are categorized by country, degree level, deadline, and eligibility to save time and reduce stress.

title: Empowering Equal Opportunity
story: By providing equal access to information, ScholarStream helps students from all backgrounds compete fairly.

title: Confidence Through Clarity
story: Clear requirements, deadlines, and application guidance allow students to apply with confidence.

title: Our Vision for the Future
story: ScholarStream aims to become a trusted global hub that connects deserving students with life-changing educational opportunities.
